snippet: Its deals represented half of all agreements in the worldwide arms bazaar, a study found. The biggest buyers of weapons globally were Qatar, Egypt and Saudi Arabia....
lead_paragraph: Its deals represented half of all agreements in the worldwide arms bazaar, a study found. The biggest buyers of weapons globally were Qatar, Egypt and Saudi Arabia.

headline.main: U.S. Sold $40 Billion in Weapons in 2015, Topping Global Market
headline.print_headline: U.S. Leads Arms Market With Sales of $40 Billion
